sentences.en: At the current stage , most of the people's sports entertaining consumption is non - gratuitous.
sentences.cn: 现阶段来看, 人们的体育娱乐消费,绝大部分还得是''.'有偿'.''''.'服务'.''.

sentences.en: children’s books which include gratuitous violence
sentences.cn: 包含无谓暴力内容的儿童书籍

sentences.en: Contributed as an act of charity; gratuitous.
sentences.cn: 免费的作为慈善行为给予的; 免费的.

sentences.en: Folly, folly , his heart kept saying: conscious , gratuitous, suicidal folly.
sentences.cn: 他心里不住地说着: 真蠢, 真蠢,蠢得自觉自愿, 蠢得无缘无故, 蠢得自己找死!

sentences.en: Graphic or gratuitous violence is not allowed.
sentences.cn: 严禁上传有暴力倾向的图文.
电视节目里无谓的暴力镜头
无端使用暴力则激起 民愤.

sentences.en: Her advice was quite gratuitous, I can think for myself.
sentences.cn: 她给的建议极为不实际, 我只有自己想办法.

sentences.en: His films are full of gratuitous violence.
sentences.cn: 他拍的影片充满了不必要的暴力.

sentences.en: I did not want to be singled out for gratuitous punishment.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意叫她提溜出来遭受这无缘无故的惩罚.

sentences.en: Intention to create legal relations - since a contract is legally enforceable, unlike mere gratuitous promises.
sentences.cn: 设立法律关系的意愿:合同具有法律上的执行力, 不同于纯粹的无偿赠与的允诺.

sentences.en: Second, shifting from free use to non - gratuitous use of forest ecological value.
sentences.cn: 二是由无偿使用森林生态效益向有偿使用森林生态效益的转变.

sentences.en: The focus here is visual flashiness and gratuitous technology.
sentences.cn: 它的焦点关注与视觉效果,对技术含量的要求不高.

sentences.en: There's too much crime and gratuitous violence on TV.
sentences.cn: 电视里充斥着犯罪和无端的暴力。

sentences.en: Though plastics have benefits , Baker says, there a lot of gratuitous use.
sentences.cn: 贝克说:尽管塑胶制品(对人类)有用处, 它也有很多不必要的使用.

sentences.en: To confuse intelligence and dislocate sentiment by gratuitous fictions is a short - sighted way of pursuing happiness.
sentences.cn: 以无理的幻想混淆智力,弄乱正常的情感是一种短视的追求幸福的方法.

words.tran_cn: 无偿地；不必要地；无缘无故地；平白地
无理由的，无端的；免费的

trans.tran_cn: 免费的，无偿的，无必要的，无故的，无理由的
trans.tran_en: said or done without a good reason, in a way that offends someone
